properties.entry: select title from assigned_quizzes aq join quizzes q on aq.quiz_id = q.quiz_id join students s on s.student_id = aq.student_id where s.email = ?
select title, mark from passed_quizzes pq join quizzes q on pq.quiz_id = q.quiz_id join students s on s.student_id = pq.student_id where s.email = ?
